pages.text: If one is nearby, Vagrants may attempt to retreive parasites stored within a Dispatcher for the sake of defense, or gathering biomass. They must directly interact with the Dispatcher to do this, which indicates that they may be able to directly interface with such parasites.

Vagrants are proven to possess human-level sapience and sentience. The information they could gain access to using Dispatchers should be more than reason enough to switch to safer methods of communication, if the other parasites weren't already enough of a reason to do so.
$(#630000)What do they mean 'communication'? If I could tap a wire, I would have done so already.
